casebody.data:
Richard J. McDERMOTT, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. NEW YORK DOCK RAILWAY, Defendant-Appellant. No. 362. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 20, 1938. James F. Fouhy, of New York City (Joseph Steven Frank, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Clifford H. Searl, of Syracuse, N. Y., for plaintiff-appellee.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment and order affirmed.
